title: Batiste Dry Shampoo 5.05 oz. Tropical
description: With a deliciously exotic fragrance, revitalises greasy, dull and lifeless hair between washes. Instantly leaves your hair feeling clean, full of body and smelling beautiful. Quick and convenient to use wherever you are. (5.05 oz.)

title: Short Sexy Hair Frenzy Texture Pomade by Sexy Hair for Unisex - 1.8 oz
description: Short sexy hair frenzy texture pomade restructures hair for stronger texture. Increases density and bulk. It adds volume and gives body. It imparts medium to firm hold.

title: e.l.f. Liquid Eyeliner (Plum) elf
description: No more tugging or pulling on your eyelids with this easy glide liquid eyeliner. The smudge-proof liner is rich in color, creating a long lasting defined look. The fine tip brush creates easy and precise definition for natural or dramatic effects
